definition: erhua variant of 壓根|压根[ya4 gen1]
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
child/son
non-syllabic diminutive suffix/retroflex final

sentences.english: Perhaps simply did Michael Diao me, I Biao to come to Sri Lanka a big stick Ning.
sentences.chinese: 你也许压根儿麦刁过我，我斯个彪来来地大棍宁。

sentences.english: They are not at all what we mean today by "child-friendly."
sentences.chinese: 其故事压根儿就不属于如今的“儿童读物”。

sentences.english: I'm completely mystified about what happened.
sentences.chinese: 我对所发生的事压根儿迷惑不解。

sentences.english: If I were Abramovich, I’d never have hired Ancelotti.
sentences.chinese: 如果我是阿布，我压根儿就不会雇佣安切洛蒂。

sentences.english: I wish it were a dream and that I had never hooked him.
sentences.chinese: 但愿这是一场梦，我压根儿没有钓到它。

sentences.english: I had to stand up for the whole trip because there were no seats.
sentences.chinese: 我整个旅程都要站着，因为压根儿就没空座位。

sentences.english: I’ve tried but it simply hasn’t happened yet.
sentences.chinese: 我做过尝试，但这种事压根儿就没有发生过。

sentences.english: I don't agree with you at all.
sentences.chinese: 我压根儿就不赞成你的主张。

sentences.english: And as to smaller-sized rooms than I had been used to, I really could not give it a thought.
sentences.chinese: 至于房间比我以前住的小，我压根儿就不会在意。

sentences.english: In fact, his male friends would not even contemplate going up there.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，他的男性朋友们压根儿就没想过要上去。
我压根儿就成不了亿万富翁。
